description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE ROOF CONVERSION, ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF DORMER WITH JULIETTE BALCONY, INSERTION OF 3 X ROOFLIGHTS ON FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY OUTBUILDING IN REAR GARDEN.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations (hip to gable roof conversion and rear roof extension) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations (insertion of 3 x roof lights to the front roof slope) would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations (erection of an outbuilding) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
